column4: See the explanation of why we don't call it 3.5, if you're really in need of the official branding, you'll want to get the binaries from mozilla.
ok, is there a way to get 64-bit builds from mozilla? I haven't found any on their ftp site
I have no idea, sorry.  You might ask #ubuntu-mozillateam, they'd be more familiar with the way mozilla does stuff by me
